system.requirements:
Tier 3: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Fellowship 35, Spirit of the Martyr. 
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Offence
system.effect:
As a Free Action,the Sister can choose one foe and spend a Fate Point to grant themselves and all allies within Willpower Bonus metres to gain the Hatred Talent for that kind of foe until the end of the encounter.
EG: Targeting an Ork Nob would give Hatred (Orks).
